channel.title: Legacy on Kelsey Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Legacy on Kelsey Chen

item.title: Install PXE Server
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction PXE Boot Components Let’s Start ! Step 1. TFTP Server Related Settings. Step 2. DHCP Server Related Settings (IPv4). Step 3. Boot Mode = UEFI. Step 4. Boot Mode = Legacy. Refer Docs ENV : OS : Ubuntu 18.04 Desktop Introduction Preboot Execution Environment (PXE) is a client-server interface that allows computers in a network to be booted from the server before deploying the obtained PC image in local and remote offices, for PXE enabled clients.
